name: netWork (itch) (Mushboi)
description:
Influence people's office futures in this visual novel containing platformer elements!
You take the role of an information delivery bot, sending messages to who you think should be the right receiver. 

Your choices will lead to one out of six different endings, with one playthrough taking about 30 minutes.

There are no savestates. Quitting back to the menu effectively resets your game, letting you try out a new path if you want to.

This game is best played at a resolution of 1920x1080; at other window sizes the image scaling could be a bit rough around the edges.

This game was created as part of a one-week gamejam held in the context of a university course.
